title.rendered: IT Consulting Services and IT Technological Services

content.rendered:
[vc_row el_class=”industry-innerpage-content”][vc_column][vc_column_text]
Every industry type is using Information Technology and the rate it influences business operations is rapidly expanding. In the modern landscape, IT plays a massive role in the way we do business. The IT Consulting Services are robust these to implement a fruitful infrastructure internally or externally.

At CONC@T, we connect our service seekers with the best IT solutions providers. Some of the solutions are as below-[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class=”industry-innerpage-content”][vc_column][vc_column_text]

  • 1. Strategy/ Technical Road Map

    Every company invests in IT at some point or the other, and they want to make sure that the investment is in alignment with the organizational goals and processes. It also requires the architecture along with the roadmap on how IT will help them to achieve their organizational goals. We help organizations to have virtual CIO services to draw your IT roadmap to support your business vision. At CONC@T, you will get the milestone tracker in which you can see the progress of your project regularly.

  • 2. Software Development

    Software development is the process of involved between the conception of software to the final manifestation of the software in a planned way. Any missing detail at the beginning may either increase the overall time and effort or do not support the business objective. At CONC@T, we connect you with the best Software development companies and project management professionals so that you can get the best version of the software that you have imagined aligned to your business objective.

  • 3. Digital Services and ITeS

    Information Technology enabled services (ITES) are the outsourcing of the processes that help the company to decrease the costs and increases the service standards. At CONC@T, we connect you with the best ITeS service providers for all your requirements, be it BPO (Business Process Outsourcing), web research, call center setup, data processing, or integration with the new age technologies like AI, ML, and IoT.

  • 4. Cyber Security, Hardware/ Cloud Services, IT Services

    All Scalable IT Tools need the right kind of foundational layer is Cyber Security, Hardware/ Cloud, or regular monitoring. At CONC@T, we offer you the right partner to take care of all such invisible yet crucial business services.

  • 5. IT Consulting Services with Governance

    IT governance provides a structure for aligning IT strategy with business goals. By following a formal framework, organizations can produce measurable results in achieving their goals. At CONC@T, we help you in connecting with the best IT governance firm to help you with- Setting up of IT governance framework, assessment of current compliance framework including cybersecurity, VAPT, data center, and code reviews, etc.

    Virtual CIO & CTO @ Tech Consulting

    CONC@T is a leading IT consulting group with state-of-art automation, analytics tools and experienced Tech mentors, We enable and curate a customized roadmap including define, design, & execution of tech strategies for superior business outcomes.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
